data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I watch a lot of movies. My ____ movies ____ the ____ kind. I ____ slow ____ are ____ too ____. Sometimes I also ____ to ____ funny ____, ____ the ____ kind ____ better. I own over 200 hundred movies.
data.partBlankContent: I watch a lot of movies. My favo____ movies a__ the exci____ kind. I th___ slow mov___ are ju__ too bor___. Sometimes I also li__ to wa___ funny mov___, b__ the exci____ kind a__ better. I own over 200 hundred movies.
data.fullContent: I watch a lot of movies. My favorite movies are the exciting kind. I think slow movies are just too boring. Sometimes I also like to watch funny movies, but the exciting kind are better. I own over 200 hundred movies.
data.answer: 我看了很多电影。我最喜欢的电影是激动人心的那种。我认为慢电影太无聊了。有时我也喜欢看有趣的电影，但刺激的那种更好。我拥有200多部电影。
